attributes.review: I don’t see how getting this app off the App Store is going to do anything to help tiktok survive. I don’t care if he has 2 Billion or 2 dollars in his pocket, he is human. Reviews are funny though lol again I just don’t see how this is going to do anything other then be a revenge tactic. Life360 on the other hand, that gotta go down!

attributes.title: If this could be lower, it would be.

attributes.review: Hi everyone. My name is Sans lovania. And I as a PROUD AMERICAN CITIZEN🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸 downloaded this app wanting to be able to keep in touch with our president from god himself DONALD J TRUMP. At first I was so happy with downloading the app with my Face ID! But after I opened the app itself up I realized one thing. They asked for my PHONE📞 AND EMAIL?!?💻 I’m sorry. But if us Americans can’t wear masks because the government use their mind control machines on us that way. Then I just gotta say, I’m NOT LETTING THE GOVERNMENT HAVE MY PHONE. Because I don’t want them accessing MY photos of me and my PROUD AMERICAN🇺🇸🇺🇸 family! God blessed the USA!
attributes.title: Totally worthless
